person.persName: William Robert Davidson (Madison, Indiana, physician and surgeon 22nd & 7th KY Inf)

body.p: Madison, Indiana, physician and soldier. Madison native. Married to Elizabeth G. Davidson in 1864. Father of Charles G. Davidson. Student in Madison in 1850. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment as second assistant surgeon from April 1863 to December 1864. Served in the 7th Kentucky Veteran Volunteer Infantry Regiment as assistant surgeon from December 1864 to August 16, 1865.
